snippet: Nearly 200 firefighters battled the five-alarm blaze that spread through a five-story apartment building in Manhattan’s NoLIta neighborhood Thursday night.
abstract: Man is arrested after igniting five-alarm blaze that killed one person and injured at least nine in Manhattan's NoLita neighborhood; authorities say suspect, whose name is not released, had been arguing with the mother of his child before setting the fire in second floor hallway of his apartment building.

byline.original: By RAVI SOMAIYA and COLIN MOYNIHAN

lead_paragraph: Nearly 200 firefighters battled the five-alarm blaze that spread through a five-story apartment building in Manhattan’s NoLIta neighborhood Thursday night.

headline.seo: Man Sets Fire in Manhattan Building, Killing One Person, Police Say
headline.main: Man Sets Fire, Killing One Person, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Man Sets Fire in Building, Killing One, the Police Say
